game.name: Love, in Debt!?
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Love, In Debt!? is a romance simulation game. You once had a beautiful relationship, but overnight you were fired, cheated on, and even got yourself in a huge debt! In order to survive, all you can do is work tirelessly! But why does it seem like you became a chick magnet after you're in debt?
